channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead Fox, 30th June
item.description:
The dead fox was reported last Thursday 26th June but has still not been collected. This has been put in a black sack but is still on the road/pavement. Can this be removed urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swingate Lane, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This car has been left here for a couple weeks, unmoved, 30th June
item.description:
We are due to have a skip placed here (outside 90 Iron Mill Lane) for our building work, but the car is in the way, and has not budged.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iron Mill Lane, Crayford, London

item.title: Grassed area in front of Lingfield house, 30th June
item.description:
This grass is being used as a dog park even tho it’s clearly stated NO DOGS ALLOWED, it’s becoming a problem need more signs and people don’t clean up after there dogs , it’s stinks and children do play there , I counted 17 dogs yesterday!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle in an abandoned state for months, 30th June
item.description:
